body:
Comment 11: 
At least it would be nice - when a user tries to use -race without the tool chain
installed - to present some instructions as to how to install the race detector, or
build the race tool chain. 

I think it is too late to get auto-install functionality in for Go 1.1. One significant
issue I can see is that users will often not have permission to write to GOROOT, so it
is better to let the administrator (even if it is that user) do he installation manually.
